mapper.select:
SELECT YDJH_ID, YDJH_DWMC, YDJH_DWBH, YDJH_DWID, YDJH_BMMC, YDJH_BMBH, YDJH_BMID, YDJH_TBR, YDJH_TBRID, to_char(YDJH_TBRQ,'yyyy/mm/dd')YDJH_TBRQ, YDJH_SPZT, YDJH_FILE, YDJH_WFID, YDJH_NOTE, YDJH_DJBH, to_char(YDJH_YF,'yyyy/mm')YDJH_YF, YDJH_YHDWMC, YDJH_YHDWID, YDJH_YHDWBH, YDJH_XMFL, YDJH_XMFLID, YDJH_BZ, YDJH_HTMC, YDJH_TBDW, YDJH_TBBM, YDJH_GLDW, YDJH_HTID, YDJH_HTBH, YHJHMX2_ID, YHJHMX2_MID, YHJHMX2_XMNR, YHJHMX2_QDZH, YHJHMX2_ZDZH, YHJHMX2_YJGCL, to_char(YHJHMX2_JHKSRQ,'yyyy/mm/dd')YHJHMX2_JHKSRQ, to_char(YHJHMX2_JHJSRQ,'yyyy/mm/dd')YHJHMX2_JHJSRQ, YHJHMX2_BZ FROM YDSGJH jh LEFT JOIN YDSGJHSBMX mx ON mx.YHJHMX2_MID = jh.YDJH_ID
AND YDJH_ID LIKE '%'||trim(#{id})||'%', AND YDJH_HTMC LIKE '%'||trim(#{htmc})||'%', AND YDJH_SPZT LIKE '%'||trim(#{spzt})||'%', AND to_date(to_char(YDJH_TBRQ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyy/mm/dd')>to_date(#{ksrq},'yyyy/mm/dd'), AND to_date(to_char(YDJH_TBRQ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyy/mm/dd')<to_date(#{jsrq},'yyyy/mm/dd'),
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO YDSGJH(YDJH_ID, YDJH_DWMC, YDJH_DWBH, YDJH_DWID, YDJH_BMMC, YDJH_BMBH, YDJH_BMID, YDJH_TBR, YDJH_TBRID, YDJH_TBRQ, YDJH_SPZT, YDJH_FILE, YDJH_WFID, YDJH_NOTE, YDJH_DJBH, YDJH_YF, YDJH_YHDWMC, YDJH_YHDWID, YDJH_YHDWBH, YDJH_XMFL, YDJH_XMFLID, YDJH_BZ, YDJH_HTMC, YDJH_TBDW, YDJH_TBBM, YDJH_GLDW, YDJH_HTID, YDJH_HTBH) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dwbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{tbrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy/mm/dd'), '未处理', #{file,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{djbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{yf,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy/mm'), #{yhdwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhdwbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xmfl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xmflid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{htmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gldw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{htid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{htbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

INSERT INTO YDSGJHSBMX(YHJHMX2_ID,YHJHMX2_MID,YHJHMX2_XMNR,YHJHMX2_QDZH,YHJHMX2_ZDZH,YHJHMX2_YJGCL, YHJHMX2_JHKSRQ,YHJHMX2_JHJSRQ,YHJHMX2_BZ)
SELECT sys_guid(), #{item.mid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.xmnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.qdzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.zdzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.yjgcl,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, to_date(#{item.jhksrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy/mm/dd'), to_date(#{item.jhjsrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy/mm/dd'), #{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} FROM DUAL
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM YDSGJH WHERE YDJH_ID IN
#{id}

DELETE FROM YDSGJHSBMX WHERE YHJHMX2_MID IN
#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT YDWC_ID, YDWC_DWMC, YDWC_DWBH, YDWC_DWID, YDWC_BMMC, YDWC_BMBH, YDWC_BMID, YDWC_TBR, YDWC_TBRID, to_char(YDWC_TBRQ,'yyyy/mm/dd')YDWC_TBRQ, YDWC_SPZT, YDWC_FILE, YDWC_WFID, YDWC_NOTE, YDWC_DJBH, to_char(YDWC_YF,'yyyy/mm')YDWC_YF, YDWC_YHDWMC, YDWC_YHDWID, YDWC_YHDWBH, YDWC_XMFL, YDWC_XMFLID, YDWC_BZ, YDWC_HTMC, YDWC_TBDW, YDWC_TBBM, YDWC_GLDW, YDWC_HTID, YDWC_HTBH, YHJHWCMX2_ID, YHJHWCMX2_MID, YHJHWCMX2_XMNR, YHJHWCMX2_QDZH, YHJHWCMX2_ZDZH, YHJHWCMX2_YJGCL, YHJHWCMX2_WCGCL, to_char(YHJHWCMX2_JHKSRQ,'yyyy/mm/dd')YHJHWCMX2_JHKSRQ, to_char(YHJHWCMX2_JHJSRQ,'yyyy/mm/dd')YHJHWCMX2_JHJSRQ, to_char(YHJHWCMX2_SJKSRQ,'yyyy/mm/dd')YHJHWCMX2_SJKSRQ, to_char(YHJHWCMX2_SJJSRQ,'yyyy/mm/dd')YHJHWCMX2_SJJSRQ, YHJHWCMX2_BZ FROM YDSGWC jh LEFT JOIN YDSGWCMX mx ON mx.YHJHWCMX2_MID = jh.YDWC_ID
AND YDWC_ID LIKE '%'||trim(#{id})||'%', AND YDWC_HTMC LIKE '%'||trim(#{htmc})||'%', AND YDWC_SPZT LIKE '%'||trim(#{spzt})||'%', AND to_date(to_char(YDWC_TBRQ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyy/mm/dd')>to_date(#{ksrq},'yyyy/mm/dd'), AND to_date(to_char(YDWC_TBRQ,'yyyy/mm/dd'),'yyyy/mm/dd')<to_date(#{jsrq},'yyyy/mm/dd'),
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO YDSGWC(YDWC_ID, YDWC_DWMC, YDWC_DWBH, YDWC_DWID, YDWC_BMMC, YDWC_BMBH, YDWC_BMID, YDWC_TBR, YDWC_TBRID, YDWC_TBRQ, YDWC_SPZT, YDWC_FILE, YDWC_WFID, YDWC_NOTE, YDWC_DJBH, YDWC_YF, YDWC_YHDWMC, YDWC_YHDWID, YDWC_YHDWBH, YDWC_XMFL, YDWC_XMFLID, YDWC_BZ, YDWC_HTMC, YDWC_TBDW, YDWC_TBBM, YDWC_GLDW, YDWC_HTID, YDWC_HTBH) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dwbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{tbrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy/mm/dd'), '未处理', #{file,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{djbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{yf,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy/mm'), #{yhdwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhdwbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xmfl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xmflid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{htmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gldw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{htid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{htbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT YHJHWCMX2_ID id,YHJHWCMX2_MID mid,YHJHWCMX2_XMNR xmnr,YHJHWCMX2_QDZH qdzh,YHJHWCMX2_ZDZH zdzh, YHJHWCMX2_YJGCL yjgcl, YHJHWCMX2_WCGCL wcgcl, YHJHWCMX2_JHKSRQ jhksrq, YHJHWCMX2_JHJSRQ jhjsrq, YHJHWCMX2_SJKSRQ sjksrq, YHJHWCMX2_SJJSRQ sjjsrq, YHJHWCMX2_BZ bz FROM YDSGWCMX WHERE YHJHWCMX2_MID = #{id}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM YDSGWCMX WHERE YHJHWCMX2_MID IN
